title: Honoring Joni Caputo upon the occasion of her retirement from the Chamber of Commerce of the Bellmores after many years of distinguished service
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring  Joni  Caputo upon the occasion of her
retirement from the Chamber of Commerce  of  the  Bellmores  after  many
years of distinguished service

WHEREAS,  Individuals  who give of their time and energies and serve the
best interests of their communities are an asset beyond remuneration and
cannot be sufficiently extolled; and
  WHEREAS, Joni Caputo has given not only of her time and  energies  but
also of her competence, intelligence and leadership and consequently has
been designated for special honor; and
  WHEREAS,  This  Legislative  Body is justly proud to honor Joni Caputo
upon the occasion of her retirement from the Chamber of Commerce of  the
Bellmores after many years of distinguished service, to be celebrated on
January 29, 2011; and
  WHEREAS, A true asset, Joni Caputo is retiring from the esteemed posi-
tion of Executive Director/Festival Coordinator; and
  WHEREAS,  Joni  Caputo has been called upon to contribute her time and
talents to countless civic and charitable endeavors and has always given
of herself unstintingly; and
  WHEREAS, Throughout the entire period  of  her  community  service,  a
period  of  constructive  involvement, Joni Caputo has stood constant in
dignity, good grace and humor; and
  WHEREAS, Rare indeed is the impressive dedication shown by an individ-
ual for the benefit of others which Joni Caputo has displayed throughout
her life; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor  Joni  Caputo upon the occasion of her retirement from the Chamber
of Commerce of the Bellmores after many years of distinguished  service;
and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Joni Caputo.
